entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
